:::{#hero-heading}

Hi there - I'm Sammi! 🚵 🏸 🎷 👩‍💻

I'm currently a trainer on the Health Service Modelling Associates (HSMA) Programme, teaching public sector analysts, clinicians and managers how to use and apply data science and operational research techniques.

I was previously a data analyst, and later data scientist, in a mental health trust in the NHS.



:::
